  <script>
	// Global vars for this script
	var globalCookieMessageId = "global-cookie-message";
	var consentCookieName = "consentCookie";
	var cookieExpiryDays = 30;

	// Gets the required expiry date and returns it as GMTString
	function getExpiryDateTimeAsGMTString() {
		var currentDate = new Date();
		currentDate.setTime(currentDate.getTime() + (cookieExpiryDays*24*60*60*1000));
		var expires = currentDate.toGMTString();
		
		return expires;
	}

	// Gets the cookie using the name of the cookie
	function getCookie(cookieName) {
		var name = cookieName + "=";
		var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		var cookieArray = decodedCookie.split(';');
		for(var i = 0; i < cookieArray.length; i++) {
			var currentCookie = cookieArray[i];

			while (currentCookie.charAt(0) == ' ') {
				currentCookie = currentCookie.substring(1);
			}

			if (currentCookie.indexOf(name) == 0) {
				return currentCookie.substring(name.length, currentCookie.length);
			}
		}

		return "";
	}

	// Determines whethe the cookie consent banner should be display or hidden
	function showHideCookieConsentBanner() {
		var consentCookieExists = getCookie(consentCookieName);
		if (consentCookieExists != "") {
			// Hide cookie banner if consentCookie is present
			hideCookieBanner();
		} else {
			// Show cookie banner if consentCookie is not present
			showCookieBanner();
		}
	}

	// Creates the consent cookie and shows confirmation message
	function createConsentCookie(value, showCookieHeader) {
		var expiryDate = getExpiryDateTimeAsGMTString();
		var cookieExpiryString = "expires=" + expiryDate;
		setCookie(value, cookieExpiryString);
	
	if(showCookieHeader){
		showCookieHeaderConfirmation(value);
		}
	}

	// Deletes all cookies
function deleteAllCookies() {
    var cookies = document.cookie.split(";");

    for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {
        var cookie = cookies[i];
        var eqPos = cookie.indexOf("=");
        var name = eqPos > -1 ? cookie.substr(0, eqPos) : cookie;
        document.cookie = name + "=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT" + ";path=/";
    }
}
	// Sets the cookie
	function setCookie(cookieValue, expiryDays) {
		document.cookie = consentCookieName + "=" + cookieValue + ";" + expiryDays + ";path=/";
	}

	// Hides the cookie banner
	function hideCookieBanner() {
		document.getElementById(globalCookieMessageId).style.display = 'none';
	}

	// Shows the cookie banner
	function showCookieBanner() {
		document.getElementById(globalCookieMessageId).hidden = false;
	    document.getElementById("govukCookieBanner").innerHTML += '<div class="govuk-button-group"> \
      <button value="accept" onclick="createConsentCookie(true, true)" type="button" name="cookies" class="govuk-button" data-module="govuk-button"> \
        Accept analytics cookies \
      </button> \
      <button value="reject" onclick="createConsentCookie(false, true)" type="button" name="cookies" class="govuk-button" data-module="govuk-button"> \
        Reject analytics cookies \
      </button> \
      <a class="govuk-link" href="/cookies/">View cookies</a> </div>';

	  document.getElementById(globalCookieMessageId).scrollIntoView();
    }
	

	// Shows the confirmation message in the header
	function showCookieHeaderConfirmation(cookieValue){
		hideCookieBanner();
		if(cookieValue){
			// When user has accepted cookies
			document.getElementById("cookieAccept").hidden = false;
			document.getElementById("cookieAccept").scrollIntoView();
		}
		else{
			// When user has rejected cookies
			document.getElementById("cookieReject").hidden = false;
			document.getElementById("cookieReject").scrollIntoView();
		}
	}

	// Hide the Cookie Confirmation message in the header
	function hideCookieHeaderConfirmation(elementId){
		document.getElementById(elementId).hidden = true;
	}

	function submitCookieForm(){
		var consentValue =  document.getElementById("analytics-cookies-yes").checked;

		if(consentValue == false){
			// Delete all cookies
			deleteAllCookies();
		}

		createConsentCookie(consentValue, false);

		showCookieConfirmationMessage();
	}

	// Show confrimation message on the cookie page
	function showCookieConfirmationMessage(){
         document.getElementById("cookieFormConfirmation").hidden = false;
		 document.getElementById("cookieFormConfirmation").scrollIntoView();
	}
</script>

						</div>
						
						<div class="post-content">
							Hello, I have some saving accounts in France and I do have to fill up a self assessment in order to pay my taxes on the interests in the UK. If I wanted to transfer some money from my French bank account to my English bank account, do I have to declare or mention it somewhere? Will I have to pay taxes on the amount of money I am transferring to the Uk? And what is the maximum amount I can transfer in one go? Thank you

							</div>

						<div class="post-content">

In terms of income tax this would not need to be declared.<br>

							<a class="author-link" href='/public/ce531fa6-9582-eb11-a812-000d3ad48b3f/forum-posts' title='rrobotx1'>
								rrobotx1</a>
							<small></small> <small></small>
							<div class="badges">
									<div data-badge="true" data-uri="/_services/badges/2ab10dab-d681-4911-b881-cc99413f07b6/ce531fa6-9582-eb11-a812-000d3ad48b3f/basic-badges"></div>
							</div>
						</div>
						
						<div class="post-content">
							Hello,
I am just arrived at the UK.  I am arranging to move money from my overseas accounts to the UK.  Part of the money moving in will be used towards the purchase of a residential house for my son in the UK.  He is currently a non-resident and will be a tax-resident in the year 2021-2022.  Need my son or I pay UK tax for the money transfer?  Does it require for any declaration of the transfer to the HMRC? Will there be any difference if the money transfer between our accounts (UK accounts) occur before and after financial year cut-off of 5April2021?

Thank you.
						</div>
						
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>

Hi,&nbsp;<br>
&nbsp;
<table>
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>Yes, &nbsp;you will not be charged&nbsp; income tax on transferring your&nbsp;capital to&nbsp; another account .<br>
			<br>
			Thank You.</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>

	// Gets the cookie using the name of the cookie
	function getConsentCookie() {
		var name = 'consentCookie' + "=";
		var decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
		var cookieArray = decodedCookie.split(';');
		for(var i = 0; i < cookieArray.length; i++) {
			var currentCookie = cookieArray[i];

			while (currentCookie.charAt(0) == ' ') {
				currentCookie = currentCookie.substring(1);
			}

			if (currentCookie.indexOf(name) == 0) {
				return currentCookie.substring(name.length, currentCookie.length);
			}
		}

		return "";
	}

		function GoToNewEditor() {
			var editCmsUrlSegment = "EditInCms";
			var currentUrl = window.location.href;
			if (currentUrl.indexOf('?') > -1) {
				var urlSegments = currentUrl.split("?");
				window.location.href = window.location.origin + '/' + editCmsUrlSegment + window.location.pathname + '?' + urlSegments[1];
			}
			else {
				window.location.href = window.location.origin + '/' + editCmsUrlSegment + window.location.pathname;
			}
		}
	</script>
